description: This peach overnight oats recipe is quick and easy to prep, tastes amazing and is perfect for kids! Having a healthy breakfast ready to eat makes morning so much less stressful!
name: Quick and Easy Peach Overnight Oats
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup fresh or frozen peaches (, chopped or mashed)
1/2 cup rolled oats (, gluten-free if needed (see note)
1/4 cup plain dairy free yogurt (, see note)
1 tablespoon chia seeds (, can omit if you donâ€™t like them)
1-2 tablespoons sweetener of choice (, I used maple syrup (optional for added sweetness)
1/2 - 3/4 cup dairy free milk of choice (, depending on how thick you like them (the creamier the milk the richer the flavor will be)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients into a bowl, jar or air tight container. Mix well, if using a jar you can put the lid on and shake it to combine. Transfer to a jar or airtight container if using a mixing like bowl.
Allow to set in the fridge overnight or for at least 2 hours.
